title: How to Store Egg Yolks

steps.headline: Pour each yolk into a separate compartment of a large ice cube tray or freeze together in a small container with a lid.
Cover the ice cube tray with a freezer bag.
Put the egg yolks into a small container.
Cover the yolks with either water or a small amount of melted butter.
Put a lid on the container and place the container in the refrigerator.
steps.description: Stored in this way, the egg yolks will keep for up to 5 days, refrigerated. Drain the water before using the egg yolks in your recipe.

tyn: Containers (ice cube tray, large or a container with a lid)

Put a lid on the container and place the container in the refrigerator. Stored in this way, the egg yolks will keep for up to 5 days, refrigerated. Drain the water before using the egg yolks in your recipe.
